name: Finding Fish
description:
Finding Fish is a non-existing game.

In this game you play as a fish but there's a catch, as you explore 5 different map checkpoints, you can variety of fishes for you to play!

What can you do in this game?

-Explore the ocean

-Collect hundreds of fishes to play

-Interact with different fishes that you encounter

-Chill around the ocean
